entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 10.0°C

Visibility: 40.2 km
Humidity: 24 %

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to valley bottom after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning then 40 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Snow level near valley bottom. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 23 March 2023
